items.title: Antique
items.excerpt: Using `sudo nmap -sCV [target ip] -oN antique-scans` to scan for tcp ports Found only a port 23 telnet and does not know the password. Itâ€™s an HP Jet Direct Using `sudo nmap -sCV -sU [target ip] --top-ports 10 -oN antique-udp-scans` Found port 123/udp open|filtered ntp and port 161/udp snmp Used snmpwalk as the tool `s
